mapper.sql: U.f_id,U.f_mobile,U.f_hua_id,U.f_nick_name,U.f_real_name,U.f_sex,date_format(U.f_birthday,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_birthday,U.f_imgProfile,U.f_default_room_id,U.f_main_room_id,U.f_utm_campaign,U.f_utm_content,U.f_is_first_login_status,U.f_user_state,U.t_channel_sub_f_id,U.f_invite_no,U.f_passwd_status,date_format(U.f_last_pwderr_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_last_pwderr_time,date_format(U.f_last_login_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_last_login_time,date_format(U.f_last_pwdmod_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_last_pwdmod_time,date_format(U.f_last_pwd_reset_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_last_pwd_reset_time,U.f_device_id,U.f_signature,U.f_channel,U.f_version,U.f_family_role,date_format(U.f_sys0_add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_sys0_add_time,date_format(U.f_sys0_upd_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_sys0_upd_time,U.t_oms_user_f_id,U.f_phone_bind_state

U.f_id as Uid,U.f_mobile as Umobile,U.f_hua_id as UhuaId,U.f_nick_name as UnickName,U.f_real_name as UrealName,U.f_sex as Usex,date_format(U.f_birthday,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as Ubirthday,U.f_imgProfile as Uimgprofile,U.f_default_room_id as UdefaultRoomId,U.f_main_room_id as UmainRoomId,U.f_utm_campaign as UutmCampaign,U.f_utm_content as UutmContent,U.f_is_first_login_status as UisFirstLoginStatus,U.f_user_state as UuserState,U.t_channel_sub_f_id as UtChannelSubFId,U.f_invite_no as UinviteNo,U.f_passwd_status as UpasswdStatus,date_format(U.f_last_pwderr_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as UlastPwderrTime,date_format(U.f_last_login_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as UlastLoginTime,date_format(U.f_last_pwdmod_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as UlastPwdmodTime,date_format(U.f_last_pwd_reset_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as UlastPwdResetTime,U.f_device_id as UdeviceId,U.f_signature as Usignature,U.f_channel as Uchannel,U.f_version as Uversion,U.f_family_role as UfamilyRole,date_format(U.f_sys0_add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as Usys0AddTime,date_format(U.f_sys0_upd_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as Usys0UpdTime,U.t_oms_user_f_id as UtOmsUserFId,U.f_phone_bind_state as UphoneBindState

U1.f_id as U1id,U1.f_mobile as U1mobile,U1.f_hua_id as U1huaId,U1.f_nick_name as U1nickName,U1.f_real_name as U1realName,U1.f_sex as U1sex,date_format(U1.f_birthday,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as U1birthday,U1.f_imgProfile as U1imgprofile,U1.f_default_room_id as U1defaultRoomId,U1.f_main_room_id as U1mainRoomId,U1.f_utm_campaign as U1utmCampaign,U1.f_utm_content as U1utmContent,U1.f_is_first_login_status as U1isFirstLoginStatus,U1.f_user_state as U1userState,U1.t_channel_sub_f_id as U1tChannelSubFId,U1.f_invite_no as U1inviteNo,U1.f_passwd_status as U1passwdStatus,date_format(U1.f_last_pwderr_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as U1lastPwderrTime,date_format(U1.f_last_login_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as U1lastLoginTime,date_format(U1.f_last_pwdmod_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as U1lastPwdmodTime,date_format(U1.f_last_pwd_reset_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as U1lastPwdResetTime,U1.f_device_id as U1deviceId,U1.f_signature as U1signature,U1.f_channel as U1channel,U1.f_version as U1version,U1.f_family_role as U1familyRole,date_format(U1.f_sys0_add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as U1sys0AddTime,date_format(U1.f_sys0_upd_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as U1sys0UpdTime,U1.t_oms_user_f_id as U1tOmsUserFId,U1.f_phone_bind_state as U1phoneBindState

if.test: _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == null or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == '' or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == false or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM != true

mapper.sql: UPDATE t_user ,f_mobile=#{mobile} ,f_hua_id=#{huaId} ,f_nick_name=#{nickName} ,f_real_name=#{realName} ,f_sex=#{sex} ,f_birthday=str_to_date(#{birthday},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_imgProfile=#{imgprofile} ,f_default_room_id=#{defaultRoomId} ,f_main_room_id=#{mainRoomId} ,f_utm_campaign=#{utmCampaign} ,f_utm_content=#{utmContent} ,f_is_first_login_status=#{isFirstLoginStatus} ,f_user_state=#{userState} ,t_channel_sub_f_id=#{tChannelSubFId} ,f_invite_no=#{inviteNo} ,f_passwd_status=#{passwdStatus} ,f_last_pwderr_time=str_to_date(#{lastPwderrTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_last_login_time=str_to_date(#{lastLoginTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_last_pwdmod_time=str_to_date(#{lastPwdmodTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_last_pwd_reset_time=str_to_date(#{lastPwdResetTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_device_id=#{deviceId} ,f_signature=#{signature} ,f_channel=#{channel} ,f_version=#{version} ,f_family_role=#{familyRole} ,f_sys0_add_time=str_to_date(#{sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_upd_time=str_to_date(#{sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time=str_to_date(#{sys0DelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time= sysdate() ,f_sys0_add_user=#{sys0AddUser} ,f_sys0_upd_user=#{sys0UpdUser} ,f_sys0_del_user=#{sys0DelUser} ,t_oms_user_f_id=#{tOmsUserFId} ,f_phone_bind_state=#{phoneBindState} ,f_sys0_del_state= 1 WHERE 1=1 AND f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND f_id=#{id}

update.foreach: UPDATE t_user ,f_mobile=#{item.mobile} ,f_hua_id=#{item.huaId} ,f_nick_name=#{item.nickName} ,f_real_name=#{item.realName} ,f_sex=#{item.sex} ,f_birthday=str_to_date(#{item.birthday},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_imgProfile=#{item.imgprofile} ,f_default_room_id=#{item.defaultRoomId} ,f_main_room_id=#{item.mainRoomId} ,f_utm_campaign=#{item.utmCampaign} ,f_utm_content=#{item.utmContent} ,f_is_first_login_status=#{item.isFirstLoginStatus} ,f_user_state=#{item.userState} ,t_channel_sub_f_id=#{item.tChannelSubFId} ,f_invite_no=#{item.inviteNo} ,f_passwd_status=#{item.passwdStatus} ,f_last_pwderr_time=str_to_date(#{item.lastPwderrTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_last_login_time=str_to_date(#{item.lastLoginTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_last_pwdmod_time=str_to_date(#{item.lastPwdmodTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_last_pwd_reset_time=str_to_date(#{item.lastPwdResetTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_device_id=#{item.deviceId} ,f_signature=#{item.signature} ,f_channel=#{item.channel} ,f_version=#{item.version} ,f_family_role=#{item.familyRole} ,f_sys0_add_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_upd_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0DelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time= sysdate() ,f_sys0_add_user=#{item.sys0AddUser} ,f_sys0_upd_user=#{item.sys0UpdUser} ,f_sys0_del_user=#{item.sys0DelUser} ,t_oms_user_f_id=#{item.tOmsUserFId} ,f_phone_bind_state=#{item.phoneBindState} ,f_sys0_del_state= 1 WHERE 1=1 AND f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND f_id=#{item.id}

mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM t_user WHERE 1=1 AND f_id IN
#{item}
